All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    Account
    Represents an account.
    AccountGateway
    A gateway for Accounts that interacts with external storage.
    AccountRepository
    Repository for storing all accounts in the system.
    AccountsController
    Controller that allows user to change an account's status
    AccountsPresenter
    Interface for statuses of accounts
    AccountsView<T extends ObservablePresenter & AccountsPresenter>
    View for managing accounts.
    AdminWishlistController
    Controller for admins to manage everyone's wishlists
    AdminWishlistPresenter
    Interface for the admin wishlist menu
    AdminWishlistView<T extends ObservablePresenter & AdminWishlistPresenter>
    View for admins to manage everyone's wishlist.
    CitiesGateway
    A gateway for Cities that interacts with external storage.
    CityManager
    Stores all cities in the program, and provides abilities to get city info, add cities, and change cities for an account.
    ControllerPool
    Initializes controllers and provides a pool for accessing them
    FxMain
    Instantiate the application using JavaFx
    GatewayPool
    A pool of gateways which initializes gateways
    GatewayPoolFactory
    Factory class that decides implementation based on input
    InMemoryAccountGateway
    pseudo-external storage of accounts and gateway
    InMemoryCitiesGateway
    Pseudo-external storage of cities and gateway
    InMemoryGatewayPool
    Pool of in-memory gateways
    InMemoryItemGateway
    A gateway for storing item details
    InMemoryThresholdsGateway
    Pseudo-external storage of thresholds.
    InMemoryTradeGateway
    Pseudo-external storage of trade data.
    InputHandler
    Handler that contains helper methods for verifying input.
    InventoryController
    Controller that deals with your inventory.
    InventoryPresenter
    Interface for presenters for inventory.
    InventoryView<T extends ObservablePresenter & InventoryPresenter>
    View for managing personal inventory.
    Item
    Represents an item.
    ItemManager
    Manager for items which edits items in the system.
    ItemsGateway
    A gateway for Items that interacts with external storage.
    ItemUtility
    Utility class for items to access certain types of items.
    JsonAccountGateway
    A gateway for Accounts that interacts with a Postgres database using a JSON object
    JsonCitiesGateway
    A gateway for Cities that interacts with a Postgres database using a JSON object
    JsonGatewayPool
    Pool of JSON gateways
    JsonItemsGateway
    A gateway for Items that interacts with a Postgres database using a JSON object
    JsonThresholdsGateway
    A gateway for Thresholds that interacts with a Postgres database using a JSON object
    JsonTradeGateway
    A gateway for Trades that interacts with a Postgres database using a JSON object
    LandingController
    Controller for managing runtime preferences such as display language and demo mode.
    LandingPresenter
    An interface for the presenter for the landing page
    LandingView<T extends ObservablePresenter & LandingPresenter>
    View for landing page.
    LoginController
    A controller to handle logins
    LoginManager
    Handles login procedure
    LoginPresenter
    Interface for presenters dealing with the login view
    LoginView<T extends ObservablePresenter & LoginPresenter>
    View for logging in.
    MenuController
    Controller for the menu
    MenuPresenter
    Interface for presenters that deal with the main menu
    MenuView<T extends ObservablePresenter & MenuPresenter>
    View for post login menu.
    ObservablePresenter
    Abstract class that enables observability.
    Permissions
    Different permissions an account can have.
    ProfileController
    Controller for managing account settings.
    ProfilePresenter
    Presenter for profile.
    ProfileView<T extends ObservablePresenter & ProfilePresenter>
    View for managing personal account.
    RegistrationController
    Controller for registering an account
    RegistrationPresenter
    Presenter for registration.
    RegistrationView<T extends ObservablePresenter & RegistrationPresenter>
    View for registering accounts.
    Roles
    Enum for different roles a user can have
    Scenes
    Constants representing each JavaFX scene.
    SceneView
    Interface for scene classes.
    SecurityUtility
    Class dealt with encryption and decryption
    SessionManager
    A class for managing the current session.
    StatusManager
    Manager responsible for dealing with frozen accounts and managing restrictions.
    ThresholdController
    Controller that deals with changing restrictions
    ThresholdPresenter
    Interface for managing thresholds.
    ThresholdRepository
    A class to store threshold values of the program.
    Thresholds
    Represents restrictions for a user's trades.
    ThresholdsGateway
    A gateway for Thresholds that interacts with external storage.
    ThresholdsView<T extends ObservablePresenter & ThresholdPresenter>
    View for managing system threshold values.
    TimePlace
    Represents the time and place of a meetup.
    Trade
    Represents a trade between users.
    TradeCancellationController
    Controller for dealing with the cancellation of trades
    TradeCancellationPresenter
    Interface for the presenter for the trade cancellation view
    TradeCancellationView<T extends ObservablePresenter & TradeCancellationPresenter>
    View for managing trade cancellations
    TradeCreatorController
    Controller that deals with the trade creation view.
    TradeCreatorPresenter
    Interface for presenter that deals with the trade creation view.
    TradeCreatorView<T extends ObservablePresenter & TradeCreatorPresenter>
    View for managing creation of trades.
    TradeEditorController
    Controller to deal with editing trades
    TradeEditorPresenter
    Interface for the presenter for the trade editor view
    TradeEditorView<T extends ObservablePresenter & TradeEditorPresenter>
    View for managing editing trades.
    TradeGateway
    A gateway for Trades that interacts with external storage.
    TradeListController
    Controller for trades and stats
    TradeListPresenter
    Interface for presenters for the trade list view
    TradeListView<T extends ObservablePresenter & TradeListPresenter>
    View for managing the trade and stats.
    TradeManager
    Manager responsible for creating and editing trades.
    TradeRepository
    Repository for storing all trades in the system.
    TradeStatus
    Different possible statuses of a trade.
    TradeUtility
    Utility class for accessing certain types of trades and information on trades.
    UIAccountsPresenter
    Presenter for dealing with the status of users
    UIAdminWishlistPresenter
    Presenter for the admins wishlist menu
    UIInventoryPresenter
    Presenter for displaying your inventory
    UILandingPresenter
    Presenter for the landing view
    UILoginPresenter
    Presenter for the login view
    UIMenuPresenter
    Presenter for the main menu view
    UIProfilePresenter
    Observable profile presenter.
    UIRegistrationPresenter
    Observable registration presenter.
    UIThresholdsPresenter
    Class for dealing with the threshold view
    UITradeCancellationPresenter
    Presenter for the trade cancellation view
    UITradeCreatorPresenter
    Presenter that deals with the trade creation view.
    UITradeEditorPresenter
    Presenter for the trade editor view
    UITradeListPresenter
    Presenter that deals with the trade list view
    UIWarehousePresenter
    Presenter for displaying pending items.
    UIWishlistPresenter
    Observable wishlist presenter.
    UseCasePool
    Initializes use cases and provides a pool for accessing them.
    ViewBuilder
    Builder responsible for constructing views.
    WarehouseController
    Controller for managing the warehouse (all items in the system).
    WarehousePresenter
    Presenter for the warehouse.
    WarehouseView<T extends ObservablePresenter & WarehousePresenter>
    View for managing the warehouse.
    WindowHandler
    Class responsible for spawning and managing the JavaFX window.
    WishlistController
    Controller for managing personal wishlist.
    WishlistManager
    Utility class of useful services for wishlist.
    WishlistPresenter
    Presenter for wishlist
    WishlistView<T extends ObservablePresenter & WishlistPresenter>
    View for managing personal wishlist.
